Common.Brochures.Common.BrochureName: Bailey Village at Downtown East - Flyer 5-4-21 EMAIL.pdf

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: located at the corner of E Market Street & Dudley Street

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: BAILEY VILLAGE AT DOWNTOWN EAST is a cutting-edge mixed use project featuring  172 apartments and retail space. Located in a growing area just east of downtown Greensboro, Downtown East, Bailey Village will be a hub of activity in an area with a retail and residential void. Strategically placed along East Market Street between North Carolina A&T University and Bennett College, Bailey Village at Downtown East is surrounded by a thriving and vibrant population of young professionals, undergraduate and graduate students, as well as professors.
